title: Following the Path of Six Gosvamis | Srila Prabhupada | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HDG Srila Prabhupada

segments.key_quote: Devotional service should not be contaminated by jñāna-kāṇḍa, karma-kāṇḍa, by fruitive activities or mental speculation.
segments.summary: Devotional service should be pure and not mixed with fruitive activities or mental speculation, but rather followed in the line of great authorities and dependent on the mercy of Krishna and his devotees.
